title: It's time for cricket World Cup, better book your rooms fast
description: The lowest room rate available at the Regenta Central Lucknow for October 29 - the day India plays against England in the city - was ₹35,218 on Booking.com on Friday while the starting rate is slightly over ₹4,000 for most other days.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
